results.name: Ensure any change to code receives approval of two strongly authenticated users
results.description: Ensure that every code change is reviewed and approved by two authorized contributors who are strongly authenticated.
results.remediation: An organization can protect specific code branches — for example, the "main" branch which often is the version deployed to production — by setting protection rules. These rules secure your code repository from unwanted or unauthorized changes. You may set requirements for any code change to that branch, and thus specify a minimum number of reviewers required to approve a change.
